languages.text: "Канцлер Версериан много лет занимает свой пост при дворе фон Валанциус. Упорным трудом и деяниями она заслужила уважение Лорд-капитана Теодоры. Можете не сомневаться — родство крови здесь ни при чем".

traits.locale_text: "Канцлер Версериан много лет занимает свой пост при дворе фон Валанциус. Упорным трудом и деяниями она заслужила уважение Лорд-капитана Теодоры. Можете не сомневаться — родство крови здесь не при чем".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."
languages.original_text: "Канцлер Версериан много лет занимает свой пост при дворе фон Валанциус. Упорным трудом и деяниями она заслужила уважение Лорд-капитана Теодоры. Можете не сомневаться — родство крови здесь ни при чем".

traits.locale_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “韦尔森宰相在冯·瓦兰修斯的宫廷中担任了许多年宰相的职务。她靠着异于常人的毅力，赢得了西奥多拉领主舰长的尊重。这点没什么可怀疑的，她并非靠着裙带关系走到了这个位置。”
languages.original_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森宰相在冯·瓦兰修斯的宫廷中担任了许多年宰相的职务。她靠着异于常人的毅力，赢得了西奥多拉领主舰长的尊重。这点没什么可怀疑的，她并非靠着裙带关系走到了这个位置。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La canciller Werserian ha ocupado el cargo en la corte de von Valancius durante años. Se ganó el respeto de la Lord Capitán Theodora mediante su perseverancia. No cabe duda de que la sangre no tuvo nada que ver».
languages.original_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."

traits.locale_text: «La canciller Werserian ha ocupado el cargo en la corte de von Valancius durante años. Se ganó el respeto de la Lord Capitán Theodora mediante su perseverancia. No cabe duda de que la sangre no tuvo nada que ver».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ウェルセリアン議長は長年、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の宮廷に仕えてきた身。キャプテン・テオドラは彼女の素晴らしい忍耐力を買っていました。血筋は関係ないと自信を持って言えます」
languages.original_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルセリアン議長は長年、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の宮廷に仕えてきた身。キャプテン・テオドラは彼女の素晴らしい忍耐力を買っていました。血筋は関係ないと自信を持って言えます」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kanzlerin Werserian bekleidet ihre Position am Hofe derer von Valancius schon viele Jahre. Sie hat sich durch große Beharrlichkeit in ihrem Wirken den Respekt von Lord Captain Theodora verdient. Es besteht kein Zweifel – Blut hatte damit nichts zu tun."
languages.original_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."

traits.locale_text: "Kanzlerin Werserian bekleidet ihre Position am Hofe derer von Valancius schon viele Jahre. Sie hat sich durch große Beharrlichkeit in ihrem Wirken den Respekt von Lord Captain Theodora verdient. Es besteht kein Zweifel – Blut hatte damit nichts zu tun."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « La chancelière Werserian est à ce poste depuis bien des années. Sa persévérance lui a valu le respect de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora en personne. Il n'y a aucun doute à avoir sur sa légitimité. Le sang n'a rien à voir là-dedans. »
languages.original_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."

traits.locale_text: « La chancelière Werserian est à ce poste depuis bien des années. Sa persévérance lui a valu le respect de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora en personne. Il n'y a aucun doute à avoir sur sa légitimité. Le sang n'a rien à voir là-dedans. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Şansölye Werserian yıllar boyunca von Valancius sarayındaki mevkisini korumuştur. Azimli çabaları sebebiyle Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın saygısını kazanmayı başarmıştır. Bu konuda şüpheye yer yok, kan bağının bununla bir ilgisi bulunmuyor."
languages.original_text: "Chancellor Werserian has held her position at the von Valancius court for many years. She earned Lord Captain Theodora's respect through acts of great perseverance. There's no room for doubt — blood had nothing to do with it."

traits.locale_text: "Şansölye Werserian yıllar boyunca von Valancius sarayındaki mevkisini korumuştur. Azimli çabaları sebebiyle Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın saygısını kazanmayı başarmıştır. Bu konuda şüpheye yer yok, kan bağının bununla bir ilgisi bulunmuyor."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
